neruina.ticking.entity.suspended: Caught Ticking Entity [%s] at (%s, %s, %s). It has been suspended.
neruina.ticking.entity.killed: Caught Ticking Entity [%s] at (%s, %s, %s). It has been killed.
neruina.ticking.entity.suspend_failed: Could not suspend Entity [%s], killing it instead.
neruina.ticking.block_state: Caught Ticking Block from random tick [%s] at (%s, %s, %s).
neruina.ticking.player: Caught Ticking Player, %s has been kicked.
neruina.ticking.item_stack: Caught Ticking Item Stack [%s] in slot [%s].
neruina.kick.message: You have been kicked due to a ticking exception on your player. Server logs will contain more information.
neruina.kick.reason:
Why was I kicked?

When a ticking exception occurs on a normal Entity Neruina will kill it to prevent the server from crashing, but if that Entity happens to be a player, it will kick them instead. If you weren't kicked the server would have crashed.
neruina.toast.title: Ticking Exception
neruina.toast.desc: Neruina caught a ticking execption on your client, see your logs for more info.
neruina.info.tooltip: Click here to learn more about ticking exceptions and what Neruina does
neruina.copy_crash.tooltip: Copies the caught ticking exception to your clipboard
neruina.teleport.entity.tooltip: Teleports you to the position of the ticking Entity
neruina.teleport.block_entity.tooltip: Teleports you to the position of the ticking Block Entity
neruina.teleport.block_state.tooltip: Teleports you to the position of the ticking Block
neruina.kill_entity.tooltip: Kills the Entity that caused the ticking exception
neruina.try_resume.entity.tooltip: Allows the Entity to resume ticking. If it crashes again it will be resuspended.
neruina.try_resume.block_entity.tooltip: Allows the Block Entity to resume ticking. If it crashes again it will be resuspended.
neruina.try_resume.block_state.tooltip: Allows the Block to resume ticking. If it crashes again it will be resuspended.
neruina.suspended.entity: This Entity [%s] has been suspended and cannot be interacted with.
commands.neruina.kill.multiple: Killed %s errored entities on request. %s were not errored.
commands.neruina.kill.multiple.singular_: Killed 1 errored Entity on request. 1 was not errored.
Killed 1 errored Entity on request. %s were not errored.
commands.neruina.kill.multiple.plural_si: Killed %s errored entities on request. 1 was not errored.
commands.neruina.kill.not_errored: Target Entity [%s] is not errored, use /kill instead.
commands.neruina.resume.entity: Resumed ticking for Entity [%s] on request.
commands.neruina.resume.block_entity: Resumed ticking for Block Entity [%s] at [%s] on request.
commands.neruina.resume.block_entity.not: Target Block Entity [%s] at [%s] is not errored.
commands.neruina.resume.block_state: Resumed ticking for Block [%s] at [%s] on request.
commands.neruina.resume.block_state.not_: Target Block [%s] at [%s] is not errored.
